meanings.definition: The interpretation of a text by reading into it one's own ideas.
meanings.sent1: In her eisegeses of the story, she added details that were not actually there.
meanings.sent2: His eisegeses of the poem made it seem like a completely different piece.
meanings.sent3: During the book club meeting, his eisegeses of the novel led to some hilarious discussions.
meanings.sent4: Her eisegeses of the painting transformed it into a whole new masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The professor's eisegeses of the ancient text made it come alive with new meaning.

meanings.definition: The act of interpreting a text in a subjective manner.
meanings.sent1: The eisegeses of the ancient script allowed for various personal interpretations.
meanings.sent2: His eisegeses of the play highlighted his unique perspective on the characters.
meanings.sent3: The eisegeses of the recipe resulted in a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her eisegeses of the map led them on a wild, imaginative journey.
meanings.sent5: The eisegeses of the dream revealed hidden meanings and emotions.
